scripts.build: npm run clean-dist && npx tsc --project ./projects/composition && npm run copy-files && node projects/composition/build-app.js $npm_config_verflag
scripts.build-decorators: npm run clean-dist && npx tsc --project ./projects/decorators && npm run load-decorators-app $npm_config_verflag
scripts.build-mixins: npm run clean-dist && npx tsc --project ./projects/mixins && npm run load-mixins-app
scripts.copy-files: cp projects/composition/rxjs.js dist/ && cp projects/composition/index.html dist/ && cp projects/composition/favicon.ico dist/
